name: Blocked (ferrefire3344)
description:
This game was made for the blackthornegameprod jam with the theme: "Less is more". I've spend around 4 hours on this game and it's my first game jam so don't judge to hard :)

Everytime you move, a clone spawns at you location, which if you touch you'll die. Furthermore there's a timer wich if it hits 0, you'll die. Have fun! 

The game fits into the theme "Less is more" by existing out of just 1 single square but having many different functions. Also the fact that you duplicate everytime you move creates more with less.
